EmailTemplate.name: Price Thermal/ FS 2016
EmailTemplate.subject: DuPont™ Nomex® / Kevlar® Fiber Price Announcement
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
DuPont Protection Technologies 5401 Jefferson Davis Highway Richmond, VA 23234
{!Account.Name}
Dear {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName} :
DuPont will increase prices for select Nomex® and Kevlar® products sold into Military Thermal and Fire Service applications on shipments beginning January 1, 2016:
The following products for Military Thermal applications will be subject to a 3% price increase: · Nomex® T462, T450, N330, N303 and N300 staple · Kevlar® 970 staple (1.5d and 4.2d)
The following products for Fire Service applications will be subject to a 5% price increase: · Nomex® T462, T450 · Nomex® N301, N302, N308, N310 producer color staple · Nomex® T430 filament · N400 spunlace · Kevlar® 970 and 970F staple · Kevlar® 964 all merges
If you have any questions or concerns, please feel free to contact me.
Sincerely, Beth L Taylor ________________________________________________
DuPont™ Protection Technologies • Account Manager Nomex®/ Kevlar® • 5401 Jefferson Davis Highway • Richmond VA 23234 Phone: (877) 713 -1299 •Fax: (800)-876-9566• beth.l.taylor@usa.dupont.com DuPont Kevlar® and Nomex® is a registered trademark of E.I. du Pont de Nemours and Company or its affiliates. All rights reserved.
